EmailTemplate.name: Part Order:Final Level Approval Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Final approval of Part Order({!SVMXC__RMA_Shipment_Order__c.Name}) is done
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Part Order({!SVMXC__RMA_Shipment_Order__c.Name}) has been approved at final level by requester manager's manager or requester sub-regional director. Please visit the link below to access the record.
Record Link- {!SVMXC__RMA_Shipment_Order__c.Link}
Thanks!
